name: Yun Da Residential Quarter
formatted_address: No. 343 Longquan Road, Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: The daily residential address is located near Renmin Middle Road, where I live with my family.

name: Yunnan University Donglu Campus
formatted_address: No. 2, Cuihu North Road, Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: The main campus of Yunnan University, where the school is located, is used for classes, studying, and campus activities.

name: Sanlian Taofen Bookstore
formatted_address: No. 2 Xuefu Road, Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: A frequently visited independent bookstore (such as Mingyuan Bookstore), used for reading, writing, and seeking inspiration, approximately once or twice a week.

name: Jinyuan Commercial Building Gymnasium
formatted_address: No. 1035, Beijing Road, Panlong District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province, China
description: The yoga lifestyle studio I frequent (such as Jingxin Yoga Lifestyle Studio), used for twice-weekly yoga classes to improve posture and alleviate anxiety.

name: Yunfang Flower and Bird Market
formatted_address: No. 2 Yongxing Road, Xishan District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: A frequently visited flower market (such as the Dounan Flower Market), used for purchasing floral materials to practice Ikenobo flower arrangement, accompanied by fellow flower arrangement enthusiast Su Man.

name: Yun Da Xiao Qu North Gate Convenience Store
formatted_address: Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province, China
description: Supermarkets located near residential communities, used for daily shopping.

name: Yunnan University East First Courtyard Bookstore
formatted_address: No. 171, Beimen Street, Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: The bookstore near the school, used for purchasing books or seeking inspiration.

name: Percentage Fitness Center
formatted_address: 5th Floor, Jiuyun Business Building, No. 130 Jinjiang Road
description: A gym near the fitness venue, used for exercise or yoga activities.

name: Yongxing Road Flower Market
formatted_address: 100 meters northeast of the intersection of Yongxing Road and Yongxing 1st Lane
description: The flower shop near the flower and bird market, used for purchasing floral materials to learn flower arrangement.

name: Yunnan Provincial Library
formatted_address: 141 Cuihu South Road, Wuhua District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province
description: The library near the school is used for studying or consulting reference materials.

name: Fanghua Li Meter Gauge Cultural and Creative Market
formatted_address: Both sides of the meter-gauge railway from Renmin East Road to Dongfeng East Road
description: The cultural and creative market near the school is used for purchasing stationery materials or seeking inspiration.
